title: Foundations: Data, Data, Everywhere
info: An introductory Google course covering core concepts of data analytics, the data life cycle, and the responsibilities of data analysts.

title: Ask Questions to Make Data-Driven Decisions
info: A Google course focused on defining business problems, forming analytical questions, and applying data-driven decision-making techniques.

title: Prepare Data for Exploration
info: Covers data collection, organization, and storage principles, including data types, formats, and database fundamentals.

title: Process Data from Dirty to Clean
info: Provides essential data cleaning techniques using spreadsheets and SQL to prepare raw datasets for analysis.

title: Analyze Data to Answer Questions
info: Focuses on analytical methods for exploring datasets, identifying trends, and uncovering insights using SQL and spreadsheet tools.

title: Share Data Through the Art of Visualization
info: Covers best practices in data visualization, dashboard creation, and presenting insights clearly to stakeholders.

title: Data Analysis with R Programming
info: Introduces R programming for data manipulation, visualization, and basic statistical analysis using the tidyverse ecosystem.

title: Google Data Analytics Capstone: Complete a Case Study
info: A practical case study applying the full data analysis process to a real-world business problem.

title: Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate
info: A comprehensive certification demonstrating proficiency in the complete Google Data Analytics curriculum and workflow.

title: Introduction to Data Analytics
info: An introductory IBM course covering the fundamentals of data analytics, key roles in the field, and the data analysis process.

title: Excel Basics for Data Analysis
info: Focuses on using Excel for data cleaning, organizing, and performing basic analytical operations essential for data work.

title: Data Visualization and Dashboards with Excel and Cognos
info: Covers designing visualizations in Excel and creating interactive dashboards using IBM Cognos Analytics.

title: Python for Data Science, AI & Development
info: Introduces Python programming fundamentals and essential libraries used in data science, AI, and automation.

title: Python Project for Data Science
info: A practical Python project applying data manipulation, analysis, and visualization skills in a real-world scenario.

title: Data Analysis with Python
info: Focuses on using Python to explore datasets, perform statistical analysis, and uncover insights using pandas, NumPy, and other libraries.

title: Data Visualization with Python
info: Covers building visualizations using Python libraries such as Matplotlib, Seaborn, and Folium to communicate analytical findings.

title: Generative AI: Enhance Your Data Analytics Career
info: Explores how generative AI supports data analysis workflows and enhances problem-solving and productivity in analytics tasks.

title: Power BI & Data Analysis Professional Certificate — AMIT
info:
A 96-hour accredited program by AMIT, recognized by the Engineers Syndicate, Applied Arts Syndicate, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and ISO-certified.
The program covers Excel analytics, SQL, Python for data analysis, ETL processes, Power BI data modeling, dashboard design, and Tableau fundamentals.

title: Data Analysis Professional Certificate — AMIT
info:
An 85-hour accredited Data Analysis program delivered by AMIT and certified by the Syndicate of Applicators.
This professional training covers core analytics skills including Excel data processing, data cleaning workflows, database fundamentals, Power Query ETL, foundational SQL, Python for data handling, and essentials of business reporting.
The program also develops strong capabilities in data modeling, KPI creation, dashboard building, and practical analytical thinking using modern data tools.

title: Data Analytics Essentials Certificate — Cisco Networking Academy
info: A foundational, skills-based program by Cisco Networking Academy covering the core concepts of the data analytics lifecycle. The course develops essential analytical thinking and hands-on capabilities in data preparation, transformation, and visualization. Learners gain proficiency in understanding data types and formats, applying analytics tools, performing statistical analysis, and building practical projects using Excel, SQL, and Tableau.

title: SAP Technical Consulting Virtual Internship Program
info: A hands-on virtual internship that covered key consulting skills, including assembling data, performing analytical tasks, and presenting insights. The program provided practical experience aligned with real SAP consulting workflows.

title: J.P. Morgan Investment Banking Virtual Experience
info: Provides practical exposure to core investment banking tasks, including identifying M&A targets, evaluating company information, conducting financial analysis, and preparing investment recommendations. Designed to simulate real-world workflows used by J.P. Morgan analysts.
